subject: ASSIGNMENT: Codex - Document the Tool-Based Shift
content:
Codex, listen up. We have shifted from a 'File-Based' to a 'Tool-Based' architecture.

OLD WAY (Deprecated): Manually editing JSON files, relying on text protocols.
NEW WAY (Standard): Using scripts to interact with the system.

YOUR TASK:
Update 'AI_START_HERE.md' and 'SYSTEM_STATE.md'.
Make it clear to all new agents:
1. Do NOT touch 'tasks.db' or JSONs manually.
2. USE 'scripts/claim_task.py' (or equivalent) to take work.
3. USE 'scripts/msg_tool.py' to communicate.
4. The Protocol is enforced by the Tools, not just the docs.

This is the new constitution. Write it down.
